required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Peer-Delivered Body Project for Young Women in High School
clinical_study.official_title: Implementation and Evaluation of the Peer-Delivered Body Project for Young Women in High School

brief_summary.textblock: This study will evaluate the impact of the Body Project (a dissonance-based program designed to address body image concerns and prevent eating disorders) on key eating disorder risk factors and relevant social and self-constructs at three time-points (pre, post, and one-year follow-up). Young women will be recruited from two high schools and will be randomized to receive the Body Project or to the control group. The Body Project will be facilitated by college-aged women.

detailed_description.textblock: Preventive models that can avert the onset of eating disorders and innovative delivery methods that increase engagement with care offer a promising approach to improving the mental health and wellness of young women. This study aims to implement and evaluate the Body Project, a 4-hour dissonance-based program designed to address body image concerns and prevent eating disorders with high school young women using a peer delivery model. This study will evaluate the impact of the Body Project on key eating disorder risk factors and relevant social and self-constructs at three time-points (pre, post, and one-year follow-up). Young women will be recruited from two high schools and will be randomized to receive the Body Project program or to the control group. The Body Project will be facilitated by college-aged young women who have been trained to deliver the Body Project.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, Post-intervention (4 weeks after baseline), 1 year post-intervention follow-up
primary_outcome.description: Self-report measure of endorsement of the thin ideal (scale 1-5 with higher scores indicating higher levels of thin ideal internalization)

primary_outcome.measure: Change in Satisfaction and Dissatisfaction with Body Parts Scale
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, Post-intervention (4 weeks after baseline), 1 year post-intervention follow-up
primary_outcome.description: Self-report measure of body dissatisfaction (scale 1-5 with higher scores indicating higher levels of dissatisfaction)

primary_outcome.measure: Change in Dutch Restrained Eating Scale
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, Post-intervention (4 weeks after baseline), 1 year post-intervention follow-up
primary_outcome.description: Self-report measure of dietary restraint (scale 1-5 with higher scores indicating higher levels of eating restraint)

primary_outcome.measure: Change in Positive Affect and Negative Affect Scale-Revised
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, Post-intervention (4 weeks after baseline), 1 year post-intervention follow-up
primary_outcome.description: Self-report measure of negative affect (scale 1-5 with higher scores indicating higher levels of negative affect)

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in Objectified Body Consciousness Scale - Body Surveillance Subscale
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, Post-intervention (4 weeks after baseline), 1 year post-intervention follow-up
secondary_outcome.description: Self-report measure of body monitoring and surveillance (scale 1-7 with higher scores indicating higher levels of body surveillance)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, Post-intervention (4 weeks after baseline), 1 year post-intervention follow-up
secondary_outcome.description: Self-report measure of loneliness (scale 1-4 with higher scores indicating higher levels of loneliness)

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in Inventory of Peer Influence on Eating Concerns
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, Post-intervention (4 weeks after baseline), 1 year post-intervention follow-up
secondary_outcome.description: Self-report measure of peer influence on eating and body concerns (scale 1-5 with higher scores indicating higher levels of peer influence)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, Post-intervention (4 weeks after baseline), 1 year post-intervention follow-up
secondary_outcome.description: Self-report measure for depressive symptom severity(scale 0-3 with higher scores indicating higher levels of depression)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, Post-intervention (4 weeks after baseline), 1 year post-intervention follow-up
secondary_outcome.description: Self-report measure for symptoms of generalized anxiety (scale 0-3 with higher scores indicating higher levels of anxiety)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, Post-intervention (4 weeks after baseline), 1 year post-intervention follow-up
secondary_outcome.description: Self-report measure of self-efficacy (scale 1-4 with higher scores indicating higher levels of self-efficacy)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, Post-intervention (4 weeks after baseline), 1 year post-intervention follow-up
secondary_outcome.description: Self-report measure of self-compassion (scale 1-5 with higher scores indicating higher levels of self-compassion)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, Post-intervention (4 weeks after baseline), 1 year post-intervention follow-up
secondary_outcome.description: Self-report measure of global self-worth (scale 1-4 with higher scores indicating higher levels of self-esteem)

secondary_outcome.measure: Sense of Belonging (Body Project group only)
secondary_outcome.description: Self-report measure of anticipated belonging with group (scale 1-7 with higher scores indicating higher levels of anticipated belonging)

secondary_outcome.measure: Sense of Belonging Follow-Up (Body Project group only)
secondary_outcome.description: Self-report measure of belonging with group (scale 1-7 with higher scores indicating higher levels of experienced belonging)

secondary_outcome.measure: Working Alliance Inventory (Body Project group only)
secondary_outcome.description: Self-report measure of therapeutic alliance with peer leaders (scale 1-5 with higher scores indicating higher levels of working alliance)
Self-reported ratings of satisfaction with program and peer leaders (scale 1-4 with higher scores indicating higher levels of program satisfaction)

secondary_outcome.measure: Fidelity and Competence (Body Project group only)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the first Body Project session to the final (fourth) Body Project session, 4 weeks on average
secondary_outcome.description: Observer-rated assessments of peer leader fidelity and competence (scale 1-10 with higher scores indicating higher levels of facilitator fidelity and competence)

arm_group.arm_group_label: Experimental: The Body Project for high school young women
arm_group.description: The 4-hour Body Project workshop delivered by trained peer leaders
The business-as-usual comparison group does not participate in the Body Project but may engage in any other programs or services they normally would

intervention.description: The Body Project is a 4-hour dissonance-based program designed to address body image concerns and prevent eating disorders. The curriculum consists of written, verbal, and behavioral exercises that provide participants with the opportunity to voluntarily and publicly critique the appearance ideal.
intervention.arm_group_label: Experimental: The Body Project for high school young women

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Female high school student
Exclusion Criteria:
- Previous participation in the Body Project program
